com.samskivert.jdbc

Class RepositoryListenerUnit<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samskivert.util.Invoker.Unit
      • com.samskivert.jdbc.WriteOnlyUnit
        • com.samskivert.jdbc.RepositoryUnit
          • com.samskivert.jdbc.RepositoryListenerUnit<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public abstract class RepositoryListenerUnit<T>
extends RepositoryUnit
    Extends the RepositoryUnit and integrates with a ResultListener.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.samskivert.util.Invoker.Unit

        queueStamp

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RepositoryListenerUnit(ResultListener<T> listener)
      Creates a repository listener unit that will report its results to the supplied result listener.
      RepositoryListenerUnit(String name, ResultListener<T> listener)
      Creates a repository listener unit that will report its results to the supplied result listener and report the supplied name in Invoker.Unit.toString().
